info.task: decrement spin button by five steps
info.title: Decrement a spin button by five steps in interaction mode

setupScript.name: setFocusOnSpinButtonAndSetPredefinedDate
setupScript.description: sets the date picker to March 19, 2021, and sets focus on the 'Day' spin button

user: With focus on the 'Day' spin button, set its value to 'fourteenth'.
instructions.raw: With focus on the 'Day' spin button, set its value to 'fourteenth'.
instructions.mode: If NVDA did not make the focus mode sound when the test page loaded, press Insert+Space to turn focus mode on.
